text:
Endgame is delivering the next generation of Security Intelligence & Analytics (SIA). Our core capabilities use data science and cutting-edge technology to give our federal and commercial customers real-time visibility across their digital domains, and our ecosystem of applications use that insight to solve a wide array of security problems. Endgame allows you to see what others canâ€™t, and to take control of your connected world.

Senior Back-end Engineer (DC or SF) https://app.jobvite.com/Jobvite/Job.aspx?m=nsiojAww&j=ozlA3f...

- Solid experience using Python and relational databases to make web applications - Familiarity with queuing systems like RabbitMQ/AMQP, Kafka, ActiveMQ, AWS SQS, ZeroMQ, etc. - Knowledge of HTTP and ability to make a RESTful web application - Experience using Linux and developing applications that run on Linux (Ubuntu, CentOS, etc) - Familiarity with search servers like ElasticSearch or SOLR - Experience with service oriented architecture, micro services and containerization - Experience with or desire to learn golang

Senior Vulnerability Researcher (Remote) https://app.jobvite.com/Jobvite/Job.aspx?m=nsiojAww&j=oZpV3f...

Senior DevOps Engineer (DC) https://app.jobvite.com/Jobvite/Job.aspx?m=nsiojAww&j=or2Q2f...

Or checkout https://www.endgame.com/career-openings and email me if anything looks interesting jbrown[@]endgame.com
